entries.quest_destroy_d: Destroy Blacksun Hunters or Blacksun Bloodstalkers.
entries.quest_location_d: 'Thrill-seekers often visit Ord Mantell, not only for the lively casinos, but to participate in savrip-tracking expeditions. The Mantellian savrip can be recognized as being one of the many pieces in a dejarik game and pose as a formidable opponent for even the most seasoned of hunters in Ord Mantell wildlife.'
entries.split_quest_alert: First-Officer Atris: <[Static] Is... *tzzzt* out there? Help me! Someone plea--[Distress signal goes dead.]>
entries.title: Car'das Fleet: Black Sun Uprising
entries.title_d: 'The Black Sun are active once again. The Car'das fleet has run into a large mass of enemies. They need an experienced pilot to come help them. I'm honored that they would call me by name for the cause!'
